price: Dan hanya kepunyaan Allah-lah kerajaan langit dan bumi.  Dia memberikan ampun kepada siapa yang dikehendaki-Nya dan mengazab siapa yang dikehendaki-Nya.  Dan Allah Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yaghfiru liman yashāu wayuʿadhibu man yashāu wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
